questions.text: What’s your favorite weekend leisure activity?

options.B: Going to the movies, attending events, etc.

questions.text: What do you do when you first wake up in the morning?

options.B: Hit the gym for a workout

questions.text: What’s your preferred method of communication?
What would be the best word to describe your clothing style?
What’s one piece of office equipment/office supply you couldn’t function without?
Which of the following places would you most prefer to live if offered the choice?
When you find yourself in a disagreement with someone, which of the following do you do the most?
When you’re in a conversation with two or more people, which of these two activities do you find yourself doing more of?
Which of the following ways do you keep the spices in your kitchen?

options.B: Organized by ones I use the most
